DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine acceptability efficacy modify Weight Watchers program 24 week . Assessments conduct 0 , 3 , 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Commercial Program Weight Loss Health Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: The following assessment measure take 0 , 3 , 6 month : Weight measurement . Weight take accord National Health Nutrition Examination survey anthropometry procedure manual . Weight measure kilogram near 0.1 kg use calibrated digital scale ( Tanita , Inc. ) participant light clothing shoe . Two measurement take . measure differ 0.2 kg , third measure take . An average closest two measure calculate use data entry . Waist circumference . Waist circumference assess baseline , 3 6 month . Waist circumference take accord National Health Nutrition Examination survey anthropometry procedure manual . Measurements take nearest 0.1cm , top pelvis ilium ( hip bone ) non-stretchable tape measure , without compress skin , end normal expiration . Two measurement take third first two fall within 0.5 cm . Aerobic stamen . Aerobic stamen assess use 6 minute walk test . Distance travel meter ( ) outcome . Flexibility . Flexibility assess Classic Sit Reach Test report inch less great reach 20 inch reference mark measure yard stick place leg . Food Cravings . The Food Craving Inventory-II ( FCI-II ) validate self-report measure general craving craving specific type food complete baseline , Months 3 6 . Respondents rate frequency craving since last time complete survey 33 food item use five-point Likert scale ( 1 , never ; 2 , rarely ; 3 , sometimes ; 4 , often ; 5 , always/almost every day ) . The FCI-II consist 5 scale ( sweet , high fat , carbohydrates/starches , fast food fat , fruit & vegetable ) constitute high order construct food craving ( total score ) . Happiness . The Oxford Happiness Questionnaire use assess happiness 0 , 3 , 6 month . The OHQ validate self-report measure broad personal happiness . Respondents rate 29 sentence 6 point Likert scale ( 1 , strongly disagree ; 6 , strong agree ) . Sleep . Participants ask complete Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) ass sleep quality duration 0 , 3 , 6 . The PSQI validate self-report measure sleep duration sleep quality . The PSQI examines seven component sleep quality retrospectively period four week : subjective sleep quality , sleep latency , sleep duration , habitual sleep efficiency , sleep disturbance , use sleep medication , daytime dysfunction last month . The patient self-rates seven area sleep . Scoring answer base 0-3 scale , whereby ' 3 ' reflect negative extreme Likert scale . The global score generate sum seven component score range 0 21 , high value correspond reduced sleep quality . Weight related quality life . The Impact Weight Quality Life-Lite ( IWQOL-Lite ) validate self-report measure individual 's perception weight affect day-to-day life . Respondents rate degree weight affect 31 item use five-point Likert scale ( 1 , never true ; 2 , rarely true ; 3 , sometimes true ; 4 , usually true ; 5 , always true ) . The IWQOL-Lite consist 5 scale ( physical function , self-esteem , sexual life , public distress , work ) . Perceived Hunger . The Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) measure sensation range across continuum value easily directly measure . Operationally , VAS horizontal line measure exactly 100 mm length , anchor word descriptor ( i.e. , Not hungry , Extremely hungry ) end . Participants ask complete three item VAS place mark line point feel represent response question . Program Satisfaction . The Satisfaction Survey self-administered survey 25 item score 5-point Likert scale . This measure complete 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 43 kg/m² Ability read speak English All ethnic group recruit Selfreport desire lose weight willing follow study recommendation Use iPhone iOS 8.0 later use daily basis , basic app skill Have access internet via computer , basic computer skill Currently follow commercial weightloss program ( include Weight Watchers ) follow weight loss program previous 6 month member Weight Watchers within past 12 month Another member household participate study . Pregnant nursing , plan become pregnant next 9 month . Planning relocate next 9 month Involvement another research study would interfere participation study Excessive alcohol intake dependence Recent weight loss ≥ 5 kg previous 6 month . Report health problem make weight loss unsupervised exercise unsafe unreasonable ( e.g. , orthopedic limitation , heart problem , history heart attack stroke ) History clinically diagnose eat disorder . Untreated thyroid disease change dose type thyroid medication previous 6 month Chronic/inflammatory gastrointestinal disorder ( Irritable Bowel Syndrome acceptable ) Taking prescription medication know effect appetite weight Previous surgical procedure weight loss . Major surgery within previous 6 month . Resting systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg rest diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg Diuretic use 1.5mg per day Diagnosis type 1 type 2 diabetes Presence implant cardiac defibrillator pacemaker . History presence cancer within past 5 year current treatment cancer ( completely resect basal squamous cell carcinoma acceptable treatment
